mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rnum, com_no, com_contents, com_date, com_lev, com_no2, board_no, user_id from(select * from tb_comment order by com_no desc)) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 10
mapper.insert: insert into tb_comment(com_no, com_contents, com_date, com_lev, com_no2, board_no, user_id) values( #{com_no}, #{com_contents}, sysdate, #{com_lev}, #{com_no2}, #{board_no}, #{user_id})
